resources.string: Click the buttons to navigate to your desired page
To keep our company growing and our aspiring programmers motivated, please support them by giving them a 4+ :)
Click on the leftmost button to access the guitar tuner
Click on the rightmost button to access the violin tuner
2: Play your instrument in a quiet environment
3: Tune your instrument as the app instructs till you hit "Perfect!"

Note: If the tuner froze when you launched it, the only way to get it back working is by restarting the app. Sorry for the inconvenience that it may have caused. For more information on this potential bug, please consult the ICS4U Summative Timetable.
Note: Please allow the app to access your microphone if you want the app to run.
For detailed information, please consult the app\'s User Manual
